SELECT MEMBER_TEL FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N' AND MEMBER_NICKNAME = #{nickname}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N' AND MEMBER_EMAIL = #{email}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N' AND MEMBER_NICK = #{nickname}

SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_TEL, NVL(MEMBER_ADDR, '미작성') MEMBER_ADDR, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월", DD"일"') ENROLL_DATE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL =#{email} AND MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N'
SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL LIKE '%' || #{email} || '%' AND MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N'

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_NAME FROM ( SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_NAME, ROWNUM AS RN FROM ( SELECT B.BOARD_NO, B.BOARD_TITLE, BT.BOARD_NAME FROM "BOARD" B JOIN BOARD_TYPE BT ON B.BOARD_CODE = BT.BOARD_CODE WHERE B.BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND B.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%${query}%' ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10 )
